source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000010_RYNE<tab>Restoring the elements to the Empty may allow life to flourish there once more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000010_RYNE<tab>Pour restaurer la faune et la flore du Grand Vide, il faut rétablir l'équilibre élémentaire de son environnement saturé de Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000020_RYNE<tab>But that isn't enough to return the environment to the way it was. No, we need to gradually reintroduce life, beginning with plants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000020_RYNE<tab>... Mais d'autres in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tions sont nécessaires. La transplantation de végétaux pourrait aider la vie à reprendre ses droits petit à petit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000030_RYNE<tab>Not just any plants, though, but those that won't be a burden on a weakened land...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000030_RYNE<tab>Dans un premier temps, choisissons soigneusement une plante qui ne drainera pas trop rapidement le peu d'oligoéléments contenus dans la terre. Nous avons donc besoin de...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000040_RYNE<tab>Such as...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000040_RYNE<tab>... Laquelle déjà<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You've become quite the scholar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je vois que quelqu'un a suivi les cours du soir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I see you've taken an interest in gardening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu t'es découvert une passion pour les plantes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>How about coffee plants?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pourquoi pas des caféiers<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000050_RYNE<tab>Oh! What a welcome surprise!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000050_RYNE<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Quelle surprise<var 1D /var>! Contente de vous voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000060_RYNE<tab>It seems you caught me rambling to myself. How embarrassing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000060_RYNE<tab>V-vous m'avez entendue parler toute seule, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000070_RYNE<tab>I've been studying botany, you see, hoping that the knowledge would help our work in the Empty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000070_RYNE<tab>Pour tout vous dire, j'aimerais participer à l'effort de réhabilitation du Grand Vide. Je passe le plus clair de mon temps ici, à apprendre la botanique.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000080_RYNE<tab>Coffee... If I recall correctly, it thrives in warm climates, with cooler nights to promote growth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000080_RYNE<tab>Des caféiers... En effet, ils s'adaptent très bien à la chaleur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000090_RYNE<tab>Yes. Yes, that might be suitable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000090_RYNE<tab>... Mais il faut aussi prendre en compte les variations de température. Je connais peut-être un endroit propice...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000100_RYNE<tab>And with a good harvest, we could set some aside for coffee biscuits!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000100_RYNE<tab>Et si nous parvenons à récolter assez de graines, nous pourrons peut-être produire encore plus de biscuits au café<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000110_RYNE<tab>Wait... It's you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000110_RYNE<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes là depuis longtemps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000120_RYNE<tab>It seems you caught me rambling to myself. How embarrassing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000120_RYNE<tab>V-vous auriez pu me faire signe, quand même...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000130_RYNE<tab>I've been studying botany, you see, hoping that the knowledge would help our work in the Empty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000130_RYNE<tab>Comme vous le voyez, je me suis mise à la botanique. J'espère remettre un peu de couleur dans Le Grand Vide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000140_RYNE<tab>But never mind that for now. What brings you to the Crystarium? It was my understanding that the Final Days were behind us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000140_RYNE<tab>Quel bon vent vous amène<var 1D /var>? J'ai entendu dire que le monde primitif avait retrouvé sa joie de vivre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000150_RYNE<tab>You wish to combat this otherworldly threat with the power of Light...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000150_RYNE<tab>Ainsi, vous avez besoin du pouvoir de la Lumière pour vaincre une créature du néant surpuissante...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000160_RYNE<tab>Please let me help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000160_RYNE<tab>Vous pouvez bien sûr compter sur moi pour vous aider<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000170_RYNE<tab>Though I've lost my connection to Hydaelyn, I can still manipulate Light to a degree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000170_RYNE<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, j'ai senti le lien m'unissant à Hydaelyn se briser récemment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000180_RYNE<tab>If there is a chance I could save others with that power, then I have to try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000180_RYNE<tab>... Mais le pouvoir de la Lumière m'habite toujours, et ce serait pour moi un honneur de l'utiliser pour le bien de tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000190_BEQLUGG<tab>'Tis done. Zero is now with us in the flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000190_BEQLUGG<tab>Navré pour l'attente. L'âme de Zero a été matérialisée avec succès.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000200_BEQLUGG<tab>The spirit vessel, I shall hold on to for operating the tower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000200_BEQLUGG<tab>Je garde le conducteur spirituel vide en consigne. Nous aurons besoin de ce sang noble pour manipuler la Tour de Cristal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000210_BEQLUGG<tab>This will help me to make sense of the controls, will it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000210_BEQLUGG<tab>Hmm... Des in<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions pour manipuler la tour<var 1D /var>? Voyons voir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000220_BEQLUGG<tab>There's a levity in his words that wasn't there before. It heartens me to know he is well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000220_BEQLUGG<tab>M-mh... mmh... Quel plaisir de lire cette écriture familière. L'exarque semble se porter à merveille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000230_BEQLUGG<tab>I shall see to the preparations as per his instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000230_BEQLUGG<tab>Je vais préparer la tour, conformément à ces directives.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My thanks for your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tu as ma gratitude.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000250_BEQLUGG<tab>Think nothing of it. That said, 'tis customary that my kind receive fitting payment for services rendered...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000250_BEQLUGG<tab>Content d'avoir pu vous “aider”... Comme le veut la tradition nu mou, auriez-vous une récompense équivalente<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not unlike we voidsent, then. In that case, you may devour some of my aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Moi qui croyais ne plus avoir affaire aux créatures du néant hors du treizième reflet... Si c'est mon éther que tu veux, régale-toi donc.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000270_BEQLUGG<tab>Are you mad? I'll do no such thing! The very suggestion is absurd!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000270_BEQLUGG<tab>Pouah<var 1D /var>! Jamais de la vie<var 1D /var>! Pour qui me prenez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000280_RYNE<tab>Now, now, let's calm down. We all have our preferences, and I'm sure no offense was intended.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000280_RYNE<tab>Allons, allons<var 1D /var>! Tous les goûts sont dans la nature... Un peu de tolérance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000290_BEQLUGG<tab>I shall attend to the tower now. The rest, I leave to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000290_BEQLUGG<tab>À plus tard. Je vous laisse vous charger du reste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000300_RYNE<tab>Zero, was it? My name is Ryne. It's a pleasure to meet you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000300_RYNE<tab>V-vous êtes Zero, si je ne m'abuse<var 1D /var>? Moi c'est Ryne, enchantée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This world isn't what I expected. While Light is indeed strong here, it's not pervasive or overwhelming. Everything looks much as it does in the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Sommes-nous vraiment dans un monde saturé de Lumière<var 1D /var>? Son ciel et ses habitants ne sont guère différents du tien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000320_RYNE<tab>We have the Warrior of Darkness to thank for that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000320_RYNE<tab>C'est grâce <var 08 E905 ((à la Guerrière)) ((au Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres que la Lumière ne règne plus en maître.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000330_RYNE<tab>If you're interested, I would be glad to show you around.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000330_RYNE<tab>Et si je vous racontais toute l'histoire pendant que nous visitons Cristarium<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Just an ordinary sky. Ordinary...and beautiful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Rien à redire, ce ciel est tout ce qu'il y a de plus normal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To think that, after so much loss, they could reclaim this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Les habitants de ce monde sont parvenus à le sauver, eux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So this is the Flood of Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Un vestige du fameux déluge de Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't remember much of the time when Darkness consumed the Thirteenth. Just the cold and the emptiness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tout ce dont je me souviens de l'afflux de Ténèbres c'est... le froid qui m'a glacé les os... et un sentiment de vide accablant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000380_RYNE<tab>Zero? Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000380_RYNE<tab>Z-Zero...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Aye. I'm fine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tout va bien... Faites pas attention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're the one who stopped this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>C'est toi qui as cristallisé cette vague<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000410_RYNE<tab>Oh, no no. That was the first Oracle of Light, Minfilia. She's since left us, but I inherited her power and legacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000410_RYNE<tab>Ah... Non. C'est Minfilia, la première prêtresse de la Lumière. J'ai juste hérité de ses pouvoirs... et de son devoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Je vois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000430_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Let's get started then, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000430_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Commençons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000440_RYNE<tab>The other transmitters are set. Whenever you're ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000440_RYNE<tab>(-Voix de Ryne-)L'installation est presque terminée. Je compte sur vous pour le dernier transmetteur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Such radiant Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Un rayon de Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's almost too much for one steeped in Darkness like me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Rien de plus aveuglant pour un être imprégné de Ténèbres comme moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000470_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000470_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(petit cri de surprise)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000480_JULLUS<tab>Whatever may have happened in the past, you're still here, Zero. Alive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000480_JULLUS<tab>Peu importe le passé. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que tu sois vivante maintenant, Zero.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000490_JULLUS<tab>What you couldn't do yesterday, you might still do today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000490_JULLUS<tab>Qui a décidé que tu ne pouvais pas accomplir maintenant ce qui t'était impossible autrefois<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If this power were mine to wield...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Si moi aussi, je possédais le pouvoir de la Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CRY OF PAIN “Argh! Ahhhhhh!] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ENDURING PAIN GRUNT “Urgh”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will not succumb... Not to Darkness...nor to Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Que ce soit face à la Lumière ou aux Ténèbres... Cette fois-ci, je ne faillirai pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[PSYCHING ROAR “Yaaaaaargh!”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000550_RYNE<tab>Zero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000550_RYNE<tab>Zero<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000560_RYNE<tab>She's...taken Light into herself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000560_RYNE<tab>Elle a absorbé toute cette Lumière<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000570_RYNE<tab>Her body struggles to contain it. She needs help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000570_RYNE<tab>Son corps a du mal à encaisser le choc... Il faut stabiliser son état de toute urgence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[FAINT GROAN “Ugh”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000590_RYNE<tab>Thank goodness... How do you feel?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000590_RYNE<tab>Vous nous avez fait une de ces peurs... Comment vous sentez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Better now, I think.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Merci, je te revaudrai ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000610_RYNE<tab>Then you're very, very lucky. Whatever possessed you to do that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000610_RYNE<tab>Doucement, pas de mouvements brusques. Que s'est-il passé exactement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000620_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I had to know if I could command the Light. If I could change my fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000620_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>J'ai fait un pari sur l'avenir... Pour changer notre destin grâce au pouvoir de la Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Once, I would never have dared to dream it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Si je ne vous avais pas rencontrés, jamais je n'aurais envisagé un acte aussi inconscient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But your friendship and your trust has helped me to see new possibilities. In myself and everything else.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Mais j'ai changé. Alors que j'étais de nature solitaire autrefois, j'ai maintenant des amis précieux sur qui compter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps that's why, when I beheld this world once damned yet saved, I saw the potential for mine to be saved as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Cette visite d'un monde en pleine renaissance a ravivé en moi l'espoir de sauver le treizième reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To become a world where Light and Darkness are in harmony, and life flourishes. A world where we're not consumed by insatiable hunger, but filled with hope for what we might create together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Je rêve d'un monde où la vie prospérerait en harmonie avec la Lumière et les Ténèbres. Un monde où l'entraide remplacerait la trahison...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If I had the strength, perhaps I could make such a dream reality. Perhaps I could awaken us from this endless nightmare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Si seulement j'avais en moi la force nécessaire, peut-être pourrais-je en faire une réalité... Une bonne fois pour toutes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That's what possessed me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Enfin... C'est ce que j'ai pensé sur le moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000690_RYNE<tab>If that's your heartfelt desire, then you mustn't be afraid to share it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000690_RYNE<tab>Dans ce cas-là, vous ne devriez pas avoir peur de vous confier à ces amis si chers à vos yeux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000700_RYNE<tab>There was a time when I lacked the courage. To voice my desires was to burden those I love...or so I convinced myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000700_RYNE<tab>J'ai été dans le même cas que vous par le passé. Je ne voulais pas causer de tort à mon compagnon de route, donc je gardais tout pour moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000710_RYNE<tab>But then I met those who believed in me. They helped me to believe in myself and find the strength to live.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000710_RYNE<tab>Mais grâce à sa confiance sans faille... J'ai trouvé le courage de lui dire que je voulais vivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000720_RYNE<tab>And so long as I'm alive, I know that I'll be fine. No matter how dire things seem. No matter where I am.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000720_RYNE<tab>Qu'il se trouve ici avec moi, ou aux confins d'un autre monde, je sais que nous sommes liés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000730_RYNE<tab>To be able to think that brought me peace, and it's a blessing I owe entirely to my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000730_RYNE<tab>Souhaiter le bonheur est important. Mais pour l'atteindre, il faut être plusieurs à le désirer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those who believe in us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Un acte de foi... Faire confiance et avoir le courage de tendre la main...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000750_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will remember your words. I know all too well that there's a limit to what we can achieve alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000750_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>... C'est vrai. J'ai appris à mes dépens que la solitude avait ses limites.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000760_RYNE<tab>As a friend, I'd like to help you fulfill your dream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000760_RYNE<tab>Ceci étant dit... En tant que confidente et amie, j'ai une proposition à vous faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000770_RYNE<tab>If you wish to take in more Light, I can keep the power in check and help your body accept it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000770_RYNE<tab>Laissez-moi vous aider à acquérir le pouvoir de la Lumière. Je veillerai à ce que votre corps s'y habitue en un rien de temps<var 1D /var>! D'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If anyone can do it, it'd be Ryne.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ryne est digne de confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It worked well enough for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je peux te garantir qu'elle sait ce qu'elle fait...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>With the power of Light <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> Dark, you'll be unstoppable!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Avec les Ténèbres et la Lumière, tu seras invincible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So it would seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>... Sans aucun doute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ah, yes. You mentioned having to absorb Light. That you still live is proof of her ability.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>C'est vrai, autrefois ton corps avait été saturé de Lumière. Te voir en pleine forme est une preuve des talents de Ryne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I certainly hope so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Et comment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Right, then. I'm counting on you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Bien, j'accepte ton aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Here I go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>C'est parti<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[STRUGGLING TO ABSORB LIGHT EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000840_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I can feel it. The Light's warmth welling within me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000840_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Je... Je sens la chaleur de la Lumière irradier en moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000850_RYNE<tab>Then I believe it worked.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000850_RYNE<tab>On dirait bien que ça a marché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With this power, I will return to the void and fight─for the world that once was, and for those I hold dear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Je vais retourner dans le néant avec ce nouveau pouvoir. Pour mon monde et mes compagnons, je vaincrai coûte que coûte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>All is in readiness. Without further ado, then... Light from beyond the rift, shine forth and banish the Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Les deux mondes seront bientôt reliés. Que la Lumière traverse les dimensions et disperse les Ténèbres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>Excellent. The tower is replete with Light from Nabaath Areng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>Une immense quantité de Lumière est en train de traverser les conduits éthéréens et de se concentrer dans la Tour de Cristal...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>Commencing transmission!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>Le moment est venu de démarrer le transfert interdimensionnel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>It works! It works! Light is flowing into the void!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>Oh, ça a marché<var 1D /var>! La Lumière se dirige droit vers le néant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000910_LYNA<tab>May this Light illuminate your way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000910_LYNA<tab>Puissent-ils parvenir à faire briller la Lumière au beau milieu des Ténèbres...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000920_RYNE<tab>You can do it, Zero. I believe in you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000920_RYNE<tab>Zero... Maintenant, tout est entre vos mains...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Look─an opening!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est ce qu'on appelle faire une percée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>It worked. Let us waste no time and sally forth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>Bon travail. Allons-y sans plus tarder<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, I fear the breach may be too narrow for you, Vrtra.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Par contre, j'ai peur que le passage soit trop étroit pour un dragon ancien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000960_VRITRA<tab>For a blessing, I prepared my simulacrum for such an eventuality.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000960_VRITRA<tab>Soyez tranquilles, je garde toujours mon pantin à proximité pour parer à ce genre d'éventualité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>My true form shall stand guard here while we explore the chasm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Mon corps originel reste ici. Ne perdons pas de temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>'Tis faint, but I sense the presence of a dragon. No doubt my sister's essence trapped within Zeromus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Je sens une présence familière au fond de l'abîme, mais elle est très faible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Not where she was held captive before, but somewhere much deeper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Au cœur du cratère, c'est là que nous trouverons Zeromus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The descent will not be so easy this time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Mais cette fois-ci, nous aurons de la compagnie lors de notre descente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The chasm swarms with voidsent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Un grand nombre d'entités sont prêtes à nous accueillir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>Summoned by Golbez, perhaps, or born of the residual Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>Certainement des renforts envoyés par Golbez... À moins qu'elles soient nées de l'éther résiduel de Zeromus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001030_ESTINIEN<tab>However they came to be, we shall cut a path through them. Is everyone ready?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001030_ESTINIEN<tab>Peu importe, le plan a toujours été de foncer dans le tas. Prêts à charger<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001040_ESTINIEN<tab>Zero...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001040_ESTINIEN<tab>Hé, Zero<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That Light should shine in the void once more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>La Lumière brille à nouveau dans le néant... Si j'avais été seule... je n'aurais jamais accompli un tel miracle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>No single one of us could have made it so. Only by joining hands were we able to kindle this Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>Ce sont nos efforts conjugués qui ont su guider la Lumière du premier reflet jusqu'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Do you see, Golbez? We needn't damn others to save ourselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Golbez... Nous allons te prouver que ce monde peut changer sans le sacrifice d'un autre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You knew this once, surely. When you tried to befriend me. When you were one of the precious few left willing to trust in another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Qu'est devenu celui qui cherchait à mettre fin à la guerre des mémorias<var 1D /var>? Tu étais le seul à encore croire en ton prochain... Tu m'as même tendu la main, m'invitant à te suivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But that man is gone, and in his place a mockery of his beliefs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Si tu es vraiment mort en devenant une créature du néant, je n'aurai aucune pitié. Pour le salut de ce monde...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001095_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001095_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(surprise)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's the same as before... Though we walk different paths, we seek the same destination. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nos chemins ne vont-ils que se croiser, une fois de plus<var 1D /var>? Le même souhait, mais des visions si différentes pour le réaliser... Je veux en avoir le cœur net.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There is something I must know. A truth that lies waiting in the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Au tréfonds de la lune rouge<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001120_DURANTE<tab>Golbez!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001120_DURANTE<tab>Golbeeeeez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001130_DURANTE<tab>This can't be happening... Not to you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001130_DURANTE<tab> Je n'arrive pas à y croire... Non, non... Pas toi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001140_DURANTE<tab>My friend... My hero... I will stop you even should it cost me my life!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001140_DURANTE<tab>Mon ami... Mon héros... Je t'arrêterai quoi qu'il m'en coûte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001150_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING, DOWN ON ONE KNEE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001150_DURANTE<tab>(halète)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001160_DURANTE<tab>Why? Why you and not me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001160_DURANTE<tab>Pourquoi...<var 1D /var>? Pourquoi...<var 1D /var>!? C'est moi qui aurais dû subir ce sort...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001170_DURANTE<tab>You were the best of us. A paragon of virtue. I could never hope to be your equal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001170_DURANTE<tab>De nous deux, le seul vrai héros, fier et in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble, c'était toi. Je ne t'arrivais pas à la cheville...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001180_DURANTE<tab>I am only the knight I am because of you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001180_DURANTE<tab>Si j'ai su mettre mon épée au service du bien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001190_DURANTE<tab>Because you believed in me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001190_DURANTE<tab>... C'est parce que tu as cru en moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001200_DURANTE<tab>[SWORD SWINGING EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001200_DURANTE<tab>(Éclat de voix)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001210_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001210_DURANTE<tab>(respiration difficile)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001220_DURANTE<tab>[PAINED LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001220_DURANTE<tab>(rire douloureux)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001230_DURANTE<tab>You would not wish to become a monster, preying upon those who've fought to protect. But neither can I bring myself to kill you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001230_DURANTE<tab>Je sais bien que tu n'as aucune envie de devenir une créature assoiffée d'éther. Mais je ne peux pas te tuer, c'est au-delà de mes forces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001240_DURANTE<tab>So rest easy, my friend, and entrust your legacy to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001240_DURANTE<tab>Continue de croire en moi dans le sommeil éternel. J'accomplirai notre idéal... l'ultime salut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001250_DURANTE<tab>You will never die, this I swear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001250_DURANTE<tab>Golbez est un héros... un héros immortel...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001260_DURANTE<tab>Through me your name shall live on, as the hero who saves the world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001260_DURANTE<tab>En son nom, je poursuivrai la lutte pour sauver notre monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001270_YSHTOLA<tab>We've been released from the memory, 'twould seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001270_YSHTOLA<tab>Il semblerait que l'illusion se soit dissipée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If Golbez was the one sealed in this memoria...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ainsi donc, c'est le mémoria où est scellé le <var 1A 02 /var>vrai<var 1A 01 /var> Golbez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then the one we've been fighting is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Dans ce cas, celui que nous avons combattu jusqu'à présent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>No more than an impostor playing at hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Exactement. Je ne suis qu'une pâle imitation...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001310_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Durante, I presume.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001310_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Golbez<var 1D /var>! Ou devrions-nous plutôt t'appeler Durante<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A name long since lost to time. History shall remember only Golbez.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ce nom appartient au passé. Seul Golbez restera dans l'Histoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001330_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Come what may, I shall deliver the world its salvation, and I will not suffer you to interfere.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001330_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Vous savez tout maintenant. Si vous persistez à vouloir empêcher Zeromus de sauver ce monde, vous devrez me passer sur le corps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You seek to free all souls from the purgatory of undeath. And to that end, you would invade another world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Rubicante disait vouloir offrir à chaque vie la fin qu'elle mérite... C'est pour cet ultime salut que tu veux envahir une autre dimension<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>While I cannot condone your methods, I understand your motive full well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tes méthodes me dégoûtent... Mais de toute évidence, nos aspirations sont les mêmes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For I'm driven by the same. I too wish to save our world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Notre souhait commun est de libérer ce monde de l'emprise des Ténèbres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I too once thought I had to bear the burden by myself. That I had no choice but to walk my path alone. But I was wrong. We may yet strive together towards our shared goal, if you would reconsider your course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Pourquoi ne pas le réaliser ensemble<var 1D /var>? J'ai refusé ton offre autrefois mais aujourd'hui, c'est moi qui fais le premier pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001380_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CONDESCENDING CHUCKLE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001380_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(rire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001390_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>If you possessed power which transcended that of Zeromus, then perhaps I would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001390_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Aurais-tu la prétention de posséder un pouvoir supérieur à celui de Zeromus<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001400_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you do not. No, you are but another voidsent, like me. And what is a candle before the sun?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001400_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Car dans le cas contraire, je ne vois pas comment l'association de deux infimes créatures pourrait sauver le néant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps we aren't all-powerful and cannot effect great change in an instant. Even so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Bien sûr, nous ne pourrons pas réaliser l'impossible, mais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001420_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Great change is what we need! Aught less has no meaning!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001420_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>C'est justement l'impossible que je suis en passe de réaliser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001430_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Having glimpsed our past, you should understand as well as any.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001430_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Vous avez vu le passé de Golbez. Vous devriez donc comprendre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001440_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>As Golbez, I dedicated myself to ending the Contramemoria. I fought the corrupted memoriates, and attempted to redeem those twisted by their power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001440_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Depuis que j'ai hérité de son nom, j'ai combattu sans relâche afin de mettre un terme à la guerre des mémorias, tout en espérant rendre leur apparence humaine à nos semblables...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001450_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Yet try as I might, I was powerless to make any meaningful change. 'Twas then, when I was floundering in despair, that she appeared─the Ascian Igeyorhm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001450_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Puis un jour, elle m'est apparue. Celle qui disait connaître le moyen de couper le mal à sa racine... L'Ascienne Igeyorhm.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001460_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Claiming to know how to excise the source of our woes, she showed me to the moon, where the servant of Light abided. 'Twas he and his ilk who had granted men unnatural powers, she said, and now prolonged the war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001460_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Elle m'a guidé jusque sur la lune afin d'y vaincre le disciple de la Lumière. Il pervertissait soi-disant l'humanité, la poussait à mener cette guerre sans fin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001470_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Believing her every word, I struck him down...and caused Darkness to engulf the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001470_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Conformément aux in<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions de l'Ascienne, j'ai tué le veilleur. Et peu de temps après, une vague de Ténèbres déferla sur le monde...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What!? Then it was you who...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Le déluge de Ténèbres<var 1D /var>! C'est toi, le responsable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001490_YSHTOLA<tab>As Emet-Selch once told us, the Thirteenth was the Ascians' first attempt at a Rejoining, before they fully understood the mechanisms at play.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001490_YSHTOLA<tab>Souviens-toi des paroles d'Emet-Selch... Dans leur projet de réunification des mondes, ils ont d'abord utilisé le treizième reflet pour leurs ex<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>They failed because they sought only to awaken the sundered Zodiark without instigating a calamity in the Source. The Darkness they unleashed had nowhere else to go...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>Igeyorhm a voulu éveiller un Zordiarche fragmenté sans pour autant provoquer de fléau dans le monde primitif. Ainsi, les Ténèbres n'avaient nulle part où aller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001510_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Having left a ruin of our world, the Ascian fled. I was a fool to trust them. To trust in others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001510_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Leurs méfaits accomplis, les Asciens nous ont abandonnés. Quel idiot... Comment ai-je pu croire en quelqu'un d'autre que moi-même<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001520_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Since that day, I have sought the means to undo my mistake. The world may be beyond saving, but I would at least restore the great flow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001520_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Depuis ce jour, j'ai erré seul dans ce monde condamné, en cherchant le pouvoir d'y restaurer le cycle de la vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001530_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>The dragon was an extraordinary windfall. A veritable font of aether that expedited my endeavors time and again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001530_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ta sœur a toute ma gratitude. Son âme gorgée à bloc d'éther a su nourrir mes plans à merveille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001540_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But it wasn't enough to achieve my objective. Far from it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001540_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, c'était encore insuffisant pour sauver le néant dans son entièreté...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>For an eternity, I had to bide my time. But the day finally came when I acquired the power I sought.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Mais enfin, après une éternité à espérer, le pouvoir que je désirais si ardemment est entre mes mains<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Aye, the remnants of the Ascians' god sealed within the moon suddenly dispersed into aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>L'incarnation des Ténèbres qui sommeillait dans la lune est retournée au flux éthéré, un miracle que même les Asciens n'ont su réaliser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>With that aether, Zeromus could be conceived. And driven by the dragon's longing for home, it shall soon arise to destroy the barrier between worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Zeromus, sa réincarnation, s'éveillera bientôt. Nul doute que l'âme d'une dragonne ancienne qui s'y est dissoute cherchera à briser la cloison dimensionnelle pour retourner à son monde d'origine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001580_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Thus will the way open to the promised land, and the death we have been too long denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001580_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Toutes les créatures du néant se joindront à la traversée. Dans cet autre monde, leurs âmes tourmentées pourront trouver la paix en rejoignant le cycle de la vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001590_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Thus will I, Golbez, bring salvation to all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001590_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ainsi nous parviendrons à l'ultime salut<var 1D /var>! Et tous loueront le nom de Golbez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So that is all you have left...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Et depuis tout ce temps, tu crois dur comme fer que c'est la seule solution...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001610_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Say what you will. You cannot stop Zeromus's awakening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001610_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Peu importe. Le réveil de Zeromus est imminent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>We're going after him, aren't we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>Ne me dis pas qu'on va en rester là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. That's why we came, after all. And besides...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Bien sûr que non. Nous devons accomplir notre devoir. Et puis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When someone believes in you, it makes you want to believe in them. In others and yourself. Jullus was right about that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Comme l'a si bien dit Jullus, la confiance est contagieuse. Et je n'ai pas dit mon dernier mot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001650_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I had hoped to bear witness to the moment our salvation is realized...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001650_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>J'aurais tant voulu assister en personne à l'accomplissement de notre salut...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001660_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But nothing must be left to chance. I will stop you here no matter the cost!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001660_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Mais je ne prendrai aucun risque. Vous ne passerez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001670_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SPELLCASTING EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001670_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(Lance un sort)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>[JUMP EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>(saute)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001690_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001690_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(attaque)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001700_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[TAKINNG DAMAGE EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001700_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(subit des dommages)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Wounded as I am, I knew that I would be hard-pressed to fight you on equal terms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Mon plan n'a jamais été de vous vaincre avec ce corps meurtri par la défaite...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And so I lured you to this place, where the advantage is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>... C'est pour ça que je vous ai attirés ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>The archfiends live!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>Il a ressuscité les quatre généraux<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impossible. Scarmiglione and Barbariccia were sealed in memoria, while Cagnazzo and Rubicante died in the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impossible. Scarmiglione et Barbariccia ont été transformés en mémorias. Quant à Cagnazzo et Rubicante, leur éther s'est dispersé dans le monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>You are not wrong. They are not the true archfiends, but shades born of their residual aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>De ce que je peux voir, ce ne sont que de pâles copies, des ombres nées de l'éther infusé dans ces monolithes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001760_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If they are shades, then their strength will pale in comparison. Even should they fight as one, we may yet prevail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001760_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Leurs pouvoirs doivent être inférieurs à ceux des originaux. Même réunis, ils ne feront pas le poids face à nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We'll tend to the archfiends. Go and put an end to Zeromus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Il faut à tout prix arrêter Zeromus. Pars devant pendant qu'on les retient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001780_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You'll do no such thing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001780_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Pas question<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Go! We'll join you as soon as we can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Vas-y<var 1D /var>! On te rattrapera<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING TOWARD GOLBEZ EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(attaque)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001810_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BLOCKING HIT EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001810_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(interjection d'effort)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001820_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It is too late. Zeromus <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> awaken, and it shall devour any who come between it and its desire. Your companion is no exception.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001820_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Vous ne parviendrez pas à empêcher le réveil de Zeromus. Bientôt, il dévorera tout ce qui se dressera devant lui... Votre pseudo-<var 08 E905 ((héroïne la première)) ((héros le premier)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>I wouldn't be so sure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>Ça, j'en doute fort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Time and again, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has faced insurmountable odds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Si vous saviez le nombre de fois où <var 08 E905 ((elle est sortie victorieuse)) ((il est sorti victorieux)) /var> de situations désespérées<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>But no matter how hopeless things seemed, <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> never given up the fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001850_ESTINIEN<tab><var 08 E905 ((Elle s'est toujours démenée)) ((Il s'est toujours démené)) /var> de toutes ses forces, sans jamais abandonner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>[KNOCKING BACK ENEMY EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>(effort intense pour repousser Cagnazzo)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001870_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So long as he has strength of will to forge on, then so too shall we!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001870_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Tant qu'il sera là pour nous montrer la voie avec détermination, nous ne faillirons pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001880_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So long as she has strength of will to forge on, then so too shall we!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001880_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Tant qu'elle sera là pour nous montrer la voie avec détermination, nous ne faillirons pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For we believe in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, and <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> believes in us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Quelle que soit la créature en travers de sa route, <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> n'en fera qu'une bouchée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And together, our Light can pierce blackest Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Il est donc de notre devoir d'honorer la confiance qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> a placée en nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(concentre son énergie)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001920_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001920_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(concentre son énergie)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001930_ZEROMUS<tab>What is this Darkness, cold and all-consuming? Where am I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001930_ZEROMUS<tab>(-???-)Il fait si sombre... et si froid... Les Ténèbres... Où suis-je...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001940_ZEROMUS<tab>I must return to my world... To my home, where my kin await...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001940_ZEROMUS<tab>Je veux retourner dans mon monde... Mes frères et sœurs m'attendent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001950_ZEROMUS<tab>Yes, I must return. I return. And none shall stand in my way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001950_ZEROMUS<tab>Oui... retrouver les miens... Je ne laisserai... personne... m'arrêter...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Release Azdaja!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Le moment de libérer Azdaja est arrivé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't let you destroy the barrier between worlds!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je ne te laisserai pas briser la barrière entre les mondes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001960_ZEROMUS<tab>Begone from my sight!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001960_ZEROMUS<tab>Hors de mon chemin<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001970_ZEROMUS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001970_ZEROMUS<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001980_ZEROMUS<tab>Graaaaaah! [Report if displayed.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001980_ZEROMUS<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001990_ZEROMUS<tab>I shall not perish... So long as they await my return, I shall endure...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001990_ZEROMUS<tab>Tant que les miens m'attendent... je n'aban<var 16 /var>don<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>rai pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002000_ESTINIEN<tab>[SWINGING LANCE EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002000_ESTINIEN<tab>(attaque)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002010_ESTINIEN<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002010_ESTINIEN<tab>Tout va comme tu veux, camarade<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002020_VARSHAHNBIG<tab> [ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002020_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>(attaque)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(attaque)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002040_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Like all voidsent, Zeromus cannot be killed. Sealing it in memoria is the only way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002040_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Zeromus se régénère sans limites. Il faut l'affaiblir suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment pour l'enfermer dans un mémoria<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002050_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002050_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002060_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002060_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002070_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ah, that it should come to this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002070_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Toute mon existence n'a été qu'une succession de frustrations...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002080_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I failed my dear friend. Fell for the Ascians' ploy and unleashed the Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002080_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Je n'ai pas été capable de sauver mon ami... Je me suis laissé berner par les Asciens et j'ai provoqué le déluge de Ténèbres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And after an eternity of waiting, I find myself on my knees...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Une éternité durant, je n'ai pu qu'attendre... Et maintenant, je suis là, à votre merci...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>How disappointed must you be in me. In the foolishness and futility of it all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ma vie a été pavée d'échecs. Je n'ai fait que ternir le nom de celui qui, prisonnier de son mémoria, doit me maudire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[STRUGGLING TO STAND EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(souffrance)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>No... I will not let it be for naught. I will not allow you to pass. I will triumph in my crusade!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>C'est pourquoi... je ferai tout pour sortir victorieux, une bonne fois pour toutes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There is no triumph to be found in this madness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Navrée, mais tu n'as aucune chance contre nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Even if the veil were to be unraveled, it would not undo what Darkness has done to the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Sauver le monde n'effacera pas le déluge de Ténèbres. Il ne redeviendra pas com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ce qu'il fut autrefois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nor would it bring Golbez back. From his slumber, you know there is no return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Le vrai Golbez, lui non plus, ne reviendra jamais... Son sommeil éternel équivaut à la mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're weak and imperfect. You know it in your heart. In spite of this, do you truly believe that you can save everyone? Are you sure you will not fail?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tu es faible. Tu es impuissant. Tout ça est vrai. Et tu veux nous faire croire qu'avec plus de pouvoir, tu sauras éviter de commettre une énième erreur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I'm no better. Weak and imperfect and plagued by doubt. Which is why I need friends to walk beside me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tout comme moi, tu as besoin de compagnons de route pour te soutenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002180_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Light...? But how?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002180_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>La Lumière...<var 1D /var>!? Une créature du néant comme toi...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002190_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This is proof that I believe in others, and they in turn believe in me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002190_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>C'est le fruit de l'amitié. J'ai trouvé en moi la force de croire en mes compagnons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A light that illuminates the way in darkest despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Le lien de Lumière qui nous unit a dissipé les Ténèbres qui m'habitaient et me donne la force d'espérer en l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002210_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Be it in a ruined city locked in ice or a world drowning in Light, it was with faith in one another that life endured. I see it clearly now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002210_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Avancer, toujours avancer. Comme ces gens que j'ai rencontrés dans des ruines gelées, ou dans un monde saturé de Lumière... Seule l'entraide leur permet de survivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002220_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You think we are capable of the same?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002220_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Et tu penses vraiment que c'est encore possible dans notre monde...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It won't be easy. Having lived too long as voidsent, we've forgotten how to trust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ce ne sera pas tâche facile. Nous avons vécu sous forme de créatures du néant pendant si longtemps...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But one thing is certain: if Zeromus succeeds and everyone dies, we'll never have the chance to try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tout ce dont je suis certaine, c'est que cet espoir mourra avec nos semblables si Zeromus les dévore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You asked me to join hands with you once, and I refused. I cannot take back that mistake, but I can extend to you the same offer. We can be better than we have been.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Comme toi autrefois, je me suis entourée d'alliés prêts à tout pour changer le cours du destin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002260_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SHOCKED GASP, REMEMBERING SOMETHING] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002260_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(surprise)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002270_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Of course. You were the memoriate we met all those years ago...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002270_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Je me souviens... C'était donc toi, la manieuse de mémorias...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002280_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BITTER LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002280_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(rire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002290_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Yes, I remember now. We hoped you would join us in our quest to end the Contramemoria.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002290_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Oui... Golbez était dans tous ses états après ton refus catégorique de nous rejoindre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you rejected us outright.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ceux qui combattaient encore pour la paix se faisaient rares... Il aurait tant aimé t'avoir à ses côtés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002310_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It left both of us discouraged─Golbez most of all. “If we could but overcome the fear that has shaped and divided us, we could change everything.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002310_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Je ne l'avais jamais vu déprimer de la sorte... Mais il croyait dur comme fer qu'ensemble, nous pouvions changer le monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Even in the midst of that terrible war, he never stopped believing in others. Not even at the end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Malgré cette guerre fratricide, il n'a jamais douté de moi ni de personne...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're Golbez now. If you would live up to his name, then you must trust in people as he did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tu es le seul et unique Golbez, maintenant. Tu as le devoir de marcher fièrement dans ses pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I cannot forgive what you have done to my sister. But she may yet be saved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Je ne te pardonnerai jamais pour ce que tu as fait subir à Azdaja. Mais sache que nous n'avons pas abandonné l'espoir de la retrouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If you can help us see her safely home and protect the Source, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>En la sauvant, nous protégerons aussi le peuple du monde primitif...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002360_YSHTOLA<tab>As Zero's friends, we should gladly share what knowledge we have to help you restore the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002360_YSHTOLA<tab>Zero sait qu'elle peut compter sur nous, mais aussi sur notre savoir. Nous trouverons un moyen de ranimer le néant, je n'en ai aucun doute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002370_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You truly believe the world of old can be ours again?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002370_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Avons-nous encore seulement le temps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I do. So long as we work together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ensemble, rien n'est impossible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We will disperse Zeromus's essence once more. The instant we do, you must call to Azdaja.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nous allons disperser Zeromus à nouveau. Lorsque son âme sera fragmentée, appelle Azdaja de toutes tes forces<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Understood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Plutôt deux fois qu'une<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[LEAPING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(attaque)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[GASP, TAKEN BY SURPRISE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(surprise)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Zero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>ZERO<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The suffocating Darkness... Like that of the rift...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aaah... C'est comme si j'étais à nouveau aspirée dans l'interstice dimensionnel...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impenetrable... Disorienting... Untethered and drifting further away...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Il fait si sombre... J'ai l'impression d'être à la dérive... Tout me semble si lointain...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>Be strong, Zero! Don't give up!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>Hé, n'abandonne pas<var 1D /var>! Aie confiance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002470_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Hold fast to yourself! Look to the Light within!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002470_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>La Lumière t'accompagne. Concentre-toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002480_YSHTOLA<tab>Your place isn't alone in the Dark, Zero. Not anymore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002480_YSHTOLA<tab>Zero, je t'en prie, entends notre appel... Tu n'es pas seule<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You can do it, Zero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero, tu peux encore te battre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you all right, Zero?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu m'as fait une de ces peurs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002490_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002490_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(soupire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Quelle question<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(soupire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You needn't worry about me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Navrée... Ça n'arrivera plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With this power from beyond the rift, I can do it. I can save everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Grâce à ce pouvoir acquis à travers les mondes, je ne faillirai plus à mon serment de protéger ceux qui me sont chers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Golbez! If you would make amends, then lend me your strength!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Golbez, c'est le moment de te racheter<var 1D /var>! Envoie tout ce que tu as dans le ventre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>(cri de charge, ooooh<var 1D /var>?)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(cri de charge, aaaah<var 1D /var>?)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Azdaja!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Il est temps de rentrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Hear my voice...and return to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Azdaja, viens avec nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002610_AZDAJA<tab>(-Azdaja-)Oh, Vrtra... There thou art...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002610_AZDAJA<tab>(-Voix d'Azdaja-)Aah... Vrtra... Tu es venu me chercher...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002620_AZDAJA<tab>(-Azdaja-)I am coming, Brother... I am coming...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002620_AZDAJA<tab>(-Voix d'Azdaja-)J'arrive... Rentrons à la maison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>Have care! Zeromus makes to resurrect!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>Vite, il commence à se régénérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not if I have anything to say about it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Pas de panique. Je protégerai son âme, quoi qu'il m'en coûte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No more, fiend!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>C'est fini, Zeromus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You're safe now, Azdaja. You're safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ah... C'est bien l'âme de ma chère sœur, j'en suis certain<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002670_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>To my sister, I shall offer up the eye in this vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002670_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Vous savez, les dragons s'incarnent grâce à leur force vitale. Je compte donc sacrifier mon œil contenu dans ce pantin, pour Azdaja...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We dragons bring forth progeny with our very life force. That which my eye harbors should be enough to grant her corporeal form.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Cet apport d'éther devrait suffire à lui offrir une nouvelle enveloppe charnelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002690_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Of course, this means I shall no longer have control over this vessel. I must ask you escort Azdaja to the surface in my stead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002690_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Mais cela signifie que je ne pourrai plus manipuler ce mannequin. S'il vous plaît, guidez Azdaja jusqu'à moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002695_ESTINIEN<tab>[CLOSED-MOUTH LAUGH “Hmph”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002695_ESTINIEN<tab> (pouffe)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002700_ESTINIEN<tab>We came to bring her home, and we'll do just that. You have my word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002700_ESTINIEN<tab>Je te rappelle que c'est pour elle qu'on a crapahuté entre les mondes. Bien sûr qu'on va s'en occuper<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Merci infiniment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002720_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>At long last, we shall be together again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002720_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>J'ai tant attendu cet instant... Azdaja... Enfin, nous sommes réunis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Where are you going?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Où vas-tu comme ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Our world may yet be restored. I thought it an impossible dream once, but having witnessed your miracles, I cannot help but believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Je viens d'assister à une succession de miracles. Tu dois donc avoir raison... Il existe bel et bien un moyen de restaurer notre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Nevertheless, I am the villain who wrought this tragedy. And in my misguided crusade, I compounded my sins.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Mais cela n'efface en rien mes péchés. J'ai sacrifié trop de vies pour mes sombres projets, y compris celles de mes généraux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>My place is not at your side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Je ne suis pas digne de marcher à tes côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[WEARY SIGH] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>(soupire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Regardless of how you may feel, by lending me your strength, you've made amends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tu n'as donc rien compris à ce que je te disais quand nous combattions<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You've earned a new beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Je t'ai demandé de rembourser l'intégralité de ta dette... Et tu l'as fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002795_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's up to you what we become to one another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002795_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ça signifie qu'on repart de “zéro”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What we couldn't do yesterday, we might still do today. Working together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Seule, je n'y arriverai pas. Mais avec toi à mes côtés, tout devient possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And should we want for strength, we need only rally more like-minded souls to our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Et si ça ne suffit pas, on réunira d'autres camarades partageant notre idéal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So let's take the first step. The two of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ouvrons ensemble ce nouveau chapitre de notre histoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002830_VRITRA<tab>Words cannot well express my relief that we could rescue my sister, nor my gratitude to all of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002830_VRITRA<tab>Je suis si heureux. Il n'y a pas de mots justes pour vous exprimer toute ma gratitude.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002840_VRITRA<tab>What of him? Golbez.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002840_VRITRA<tab>Mais... où est Golbez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>He felt it would be inappropriate for him to be present at your reunion with Azdaja, and chose to remain down in the chasm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Il a préféré rester en bas. Il ne voulait pas gâcher vos retrouvailles après tout le mal qu'il a causé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If you wish to hear an apology, however, I should be glad to drag him here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tu veux peut-être que j'aille le chercher pour qu'il s'excuse en personne<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002870_VRITRA<tab>Nay, that shall not be necessary. By his deeds hath he demonstrated his contrition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002870_VRITRA<tab>Non, je sais que ses regrets sont sincères. Il n'est plus une menace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>So, what will you do now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>Et du coup, c'est quoi la suite<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I've learned much journeying together with you. Experienced things I could never have experienced alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Notre court périple était plus riche en en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments qu'une éternité passée dans le néant. Si on a pu l'accomplir, c'est parce qu'on était ensemble...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Together with Golbez, I hope to do the same as we labor to restore the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Dans un premier temps, je compte voyager avec Golbez, à la recherche d'un moyen de restaurer notre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002910_ESTINIEN<tab>Then I suppose it's farewell for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002910_ESTINIEN<tab>Je vois... C'est donc ici que nos routes se séparent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Be sure to share with Golbez what you've learned of the Source and its reflections, as well as the true nature of Light and Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Zero, je compte sur toi pour expliquer à Golbez la vérité sur le monde primitif et ses reflets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>He is as resourceful as he is determined, and will surely make the very most of the insights.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Puisqu'il a su découvrir par lui-même l'opportunité que lui offrait Zeromus, sa perspective pourrait nous mettre sur la voie d'une meilleure solution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Indeed. Once we've gained a better understanding of the situation, I hope we can rely on your counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Entendu. Lorsque notre périple touchera à sa fin, tu seras toujours disposée à en discuter avec nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>But of course. I too shall continue probing new possibilities, the better to be of aid when the time comes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>Bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Mais sois certaine que, de mon côté, je ne vais pas rester les bras croisés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, speaking of which...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, j'allais oublier...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>From ocean rise and cloudbank form,
From mountain spring and rainfall storm,
From river flow and life be born...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>De la mer, tu t'élèves et façonnes les nuages... Des montagnes, tu ruisselles et formes les rivières... Toi, source de toute vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>Come forth, my servant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>Nixe, viens à moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>I revised the incantation. Which is not to say you know how it went before...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>J'ai parachevé la formule magique. Bien sûr, vous n'avez jamais entendu l'ancienne incantation...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002995_YSHTOLA<tab>Are we clear?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002995_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est compris<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Nidhana provided me with spare warding scales, which apparently provide greater protection than before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>J'avais conservé cette écaille garde-âme au cas où. Nidhana et les alchimistes ont amélioré son efficacité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>This should keep the familiar safe. So long as you give the nixie aether from time to time, it will persist and serve as a beacon for us to find you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>Si tu partages ré<var 16 /var>gu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment ton éther avec cette petite nixe, elle ne devrait pas disparaître de sitôt. Grâce à elle, nos routes pourront se recroiser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Already we find ourselves with a new ally. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Merci. On gagne un compagnon de route avant le départ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When you have the chance, please thank everyone for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Si tu en as l'occasion, remercie pour moi tous ceux sans qui rien n'aurait été possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those in Radz-at-Han, Garlemald, Sharlayan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Jullus, Alphinaud, Alisaie... Sans oublier Urianger, Thancred, Nidhana et Mehryde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...the First, and on the moon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Et quand tu retourneras à Cristarium, n'oublie pas Ryne, Beq Lugg et tous ceux qui ont aidé à installer les transmetteurs d'éther...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A lengthy list.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Tant d'amis en si peu de temps...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A gift for Ryne, in return for the Light she helped me harness. It's the memoria holding Zeromus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>D'ailleurs, je voudrais que tu donnes à Ryne le mémoria de Zeromus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If used to augment Darkness in the First, it may help to create balance between our worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>En guise de re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ment pour toute la Lumière que nous avons reçue. J'espère que les Ténèbres qu'il contient aideront à rapprocher nos deux mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>An excellent idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est une excellente idée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Similarly, why not entrust the archfiends' memoria to Zero?
