target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Puisque nous échangeons des mémorias, pourquoi ne pas confier à Zero ceux des généraux de Golbez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>In that case, I shall pass them on to Golbez. To inspire and admonish him in equal measure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Je suis sûre qu'il appréciera ce geste. Leur sacrifice ne doit pas être vain.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see you again, right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>À très bientôt, Zero<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Thirteenth is in good hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Votre monde renaîtra un jour, j'en suis certain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You should know about Unukalhai and Cylva...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Unukalhai et Cyella poursuivent le même objectif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You will, I'm sure. Just don't try to forcibly summon me. I won't come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Sans faute<var 1D /var>! Mais ne t'amuse pas à m'invoquer de force, car je ne me laisserai pas faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Come what may, we will see it restored. And should we need a helping hand, I hope we can count on you once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Moi aussi, j'en ai la conviction. Et en cas de pépin, je sais que tu seras là pour nous aider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What? There are others from our world who seek to restore it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Tu veux dire que nous ne sommes pas les seuls à vouloir sauver le néant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then please tell them this: though we are worlds apart, in our shared objective, we walk as one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Dans ce cas, transmets-leur que nous souhaitons marcher main dans la main pour le salut de ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003160_VRITRA<tab>Sad though it is to say farewell, 'tis past time we returned home. Pray climb upon my back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003160_VRITRA<tab>Il est temps de retourner auprès des nôtres. Montez tous sur mon dos<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Till we meet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Bon voyage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003180_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No matter where we are or how much time passes, our bond will endure. This I believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003180_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ici ou aux confins d'un autre monde... nous poursuivrons in<var 16 /var>las<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment notre route, jusqu'à ce que nos chemins se croisent à nouveau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003190_JULLUS<tab>Oh, it's you again. Is everything all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003190_JULLUS<tab>Qu'est-ce que vous faites tous là<var 1D /var>? Encore une histoire de créatures du néant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>So you were able to rescue Azdaja... Thank the Twelve.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ainsi donc, vous avez pu sauver Azdaja. Quel soulagement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003210_ALISAIE<tab>Channeling Light from the First was rather ingenious. It may fall short of cross-rift travel, but it's still an impressive achievement in my book.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003210_ALISAIE<tab>Envoyer la Lumière du premier reflet vers le néant était une idée de génie, d'autant plus que ce n'est pas facile de voyager entre les mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>You're too kind. Suffice it to say, though, that I don't intend to rest on these laurels. There's always more to be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>Merci. Je vais continuer mes recherches. Dès que je découvrirai du nouveau sur les voyages interdimensionnels, vous serez les premiers informés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003230_JULLUS<tab>Zero stayed in the void, did she? Well...if I had known it would come to that, I would've said a proper farewell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003230_JULLUS<tab>... Si j'avais su que Zero ne reviendrait pas, je lui aurais fait mes adieux en bonne et due forme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero took your words to heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero n'a pas oublié tes en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero sends her thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Elle te remercie beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003240_JULLUS<tab>Really...? I don't remember saying anything profound...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003240_JULLUS<tab>Ah bon<var 1D /var>!? Pourtant, je n'ai fait que rabâcher des évidences...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003250_JULLUS<tab>Thanks for what? I don't recall doing anything in particular for her. On the contrary, she's the one who risked life and limb.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003250_JULLUS<tab>Zero<var 1D /var>? Vraiment<var 1D /var>!? Pourtant c'est plutôt moi qui lui suis redevable. Je n'ai même pas eu l'occasion de me rendre utile pour elle...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003260_JULLUS<tab>Still...I'm glad that she got something out of her time here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003260_JULLUS<tab>Au final, l'important ce sont les souvenirs qu'on a en commun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003270_JULLUS<tab>As the days roll on, things will change for the both of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003270_JULLUS<tab>Elle et moi, on va continuer notre route, chacun dans notre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003280_JULLUS<tab>But some things will remain as they are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003280_JULLUS<tab>Mais certaines choses ne changent pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003290_JULLUS<tab>As far as I'm concerned, Zero will always be a friend and comrade. And I will never forget her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003290_JULLUS<tab>Je ne t'oublierai jamais, Zero. Bien que venant d'un autre monde, tu t'es battue à nos côtés. Tu seras toujours notre amie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003300_ALISAIE<tab>If she's working tirelessly to restore the Thirteenth, it wouldn't do to be outdone here. When next Zero visits, we must see to it that you have a shiny new Garlemald to show her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003300_ALISAIE<tab>Il va falloir qu'on redouble d'efforts<var 1D /var>! Le jour où elle reviendra, il faudra la surprendre en lui faisant visiter une Garlemald flambant neuve.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003310_JULLUS<tab>Indeed... And speaking of rebuilding, there's a matter I'd like to discuss with you and Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003310_JULLUS<tab>Ah, justement... Alphinaud, Alisaie, j'avais quelque chose d'important à vous dire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003320_JULLUS<tab>Word has spread of our dealings with Radz-at-Han, and people are excited by the prospect of standing on our own two feet again. Naturally, it won't be straightforward─it never is─but on the whole, I have a good feeling about things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003320_JULLUS<tab>En fait... La rumeur de nos accords avec Radz-at-Han s'est répandue... Et malgré notre montagne de problèmes, les Garlemaldais pensent qu'il s'agit d'une occasion de voler à nouveau de nos propres ailes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003330_ALPHINAUD<tab>In other words...it may be time for us to limit our involvement, that Garleans might take the lead? I can see the sense in that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003330_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Je vois. Et notre présence risquerait de gêner plus qu'autre chose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003340_JULLUS<tab>No, no, that's not what I meant at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003340_JULLUS<tab>N-non, pas du tout...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003350_JULLUS<tab>Seeing as things are going well, we want you to take a rest. A <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> rest. That's what I wanted to say, on everyone's behalf.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003350_JULLUS<tab>Justement, comme nos affaires semblent être sur de bons rails, on s'est dit que vous méritiez bien quelques vacances<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003360_JULLUS<tab>You've done so much for us already. Toiled beside us in the cold for far longer than anyone could ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003360_JULLUS<tab>Plus que vos paroles, vos actes de bonté parlent d'eux-mêmes, et nous vous en sommes re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003370_JULLUS<tab>You've earned a reprieve a hundred times over. So go on, step away from here and head...wherever you like. But if it were me, I'd choose somewhere warm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003370_JULLUS<tab>Merci de travailler toujours aussi tard, dans le froid. Mais vous aussi, vous avez le droit de changer d'air et de vous reposer de temps en temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003380_ALISAIE<tab>I was thinking of taking a break anyway...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003380_ALISAIE<tab>Bande d'idiots...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Far be it from us to go against such a heartfelt request. Though I would be lying were I to say matters here wouldn't weigh on our minds...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003390_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'imagine que le refus n'est pas une option... Mais ce serait mentir de dire que vous n'occuperez pas nos pensées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003400_ALISAIE<tab>We could take a leaf out of Zero's book and roam about for a while.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003400_ALISAIE<tab>Et si on faisait comme Zero<var 1D /var>? Une sorte de tour du monde, toi et moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003410_ALISAIE<tab>Maybe visit nations who share little history with Garlemald─look for opportunities to foster future relations. We might learn something of recent foreign affairs that has escaped our notice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003410_ALISAIE<tab>Certaines contrées n'ont jamais interagi avec Garlemald. De nouveaux partenariats sont toujours possibles, et on pourrait aussi s'informer des événements récents en Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hm, as an independent party, we would be well suited to the task... An excellent idea, Alisaie.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quelle excellente idée<var 1D /var>! C'est un rôle qui siéra par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à des intervenants neutres tels que nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003430_JULLUS<tab>Well, that hardly sounds like a rest at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003430_JULLUS<tab>Un rôle, des partenariats... Dites, vous avez vraiment l'intention de prendre du repos<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003440_ALPHINAUD<tab>To us, it is the best kind of rest─stimulating and meaningful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003440_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pour nous, ce sera comme un séjour à Costa del Sol.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003450_ALISAIE<tab>If it's settled, then let's return to Sharlayan and consider our options.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003450_ALISAIE<tab>Bon. Assez papoté. Retournons à Sharlayan pour planifier tout ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003460_ALISAIE<tab>What about the rest of you? Do you have any plans?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003460_ALISAIE<tab>Vous nous accompagnez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>We're indebted to Lord Fourchenault and his colleagues for their cooperation. 'Twould be meet to report on the outcome of our mission.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>Ne penses-tu pas que nous devons un rapport à Fourchenault et ses collaborateurs<var 1D /var>? Après tout, ils nous ont autorisés à consulter les rayons interdits du Noumène et à utiliser les réservoirs d'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then it seems we are all bound for Sharlayan. Upon arriving, let us seek out Atheleys at the Rostra and have her notify Father.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alors, faisons la route ensemble. Nous nous rendrons aux Rostres pour parler à Atheleys et faciliter vos démarches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003490_BEQLUGG<tab>Ah yes, the king has already shared what they glimpsed in the Source. The day is won, and the danger passed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003490_BEQLUGG<tab>Mm mmh... Sa Majesté Titania nous a confirmé qu'elle n'avait pas vu de créatures du néant envahir le monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003500_BEQLUGG<tab>Hearing the tidings lifted a great weight from my shoulders. Never before had I taken on such a monumental request.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003500_BEQLUGG<tab>On m'a souvent demandé de l'aide, mais jamais d'une telle ampleur. Je suis soulagé que tout soit terminé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003510_LYNA<tab>Small though it was, we are glad to have played a role in saving the Exarch's home, and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003510_LYNA<tab>Je suis heureuse que nous ayons pu vous rendre la pareille avec notre Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003520_LYNA<tab>Furthermore, the endeavor served to reaffirm the bond between the peoples of Norvrandt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003520_LYNA<tab>D'ailleurs, cette mission nous a aussi permis de resserrer nos liens entre habitants de Norvrandt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003530_LYNA<tab>Nurturing this bond, we will strive to be an example for the world Zero aspires to restore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003530_LYNA<tab>Pour que notre monde serve de modèle à celui de Zero, nous allons redoubler d'efforts et continuer de coopérer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003540_RYNE<tab>Is that...a memoria crystal? I can feel it... The tremendous Darkness within...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003540_RYNE<tab>Oh... C'est donc cela, un mémoria<var 1D /var>? Je sens de puissantes Ténèbres en émaner...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003550_RYNE<tab>Using Darkness from the void to restore balance to this world... If such a thing could be done...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003550_RYNE<tab>Utiliser les Ténèbres du néant pour aider notre monde à retrouver l'équilibre... Effectivement, si tout se déroule comme prévu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003560_BEQLUGG<tab>Well, well... Though night has returned to our world, Darkness cannot arise of its own accord, much less in abundance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003560_BEQLUGG<tab>Ce serait une compensation inespérée<var 1D /var>! Bien que nous ayons retrouvé l'alternance entre le jour et la nuit, la quantité de Ténèbres dans notre monde est encore loin d'être suffisante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003570_BEQLUGG<tab>But if it could be brought here in like manner to how we channeled Light to the void, it may well be possible to restore the Empty in its entirety!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003570_BEQLUGG<tab>Si nous parvenons à canaliser cette énergie ténébreuse comme nous l'avons fait pour envoyer notre Lumière au néant, ce serait une avancée considérable pour la réhabilitation du Grand Vide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003580_BEQLUGG<tab>Do you still have that spirit vessel with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003580_BEQLUGG<tab>Vous resterait-il un conducteur spirituel vide, par hasard<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003590_BEQLUGG<tab>If so, I beg you loan it to me for a time. I would use it to investigate a way to have the tower receive rather than send energy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003590_BEQLUGG<tab>J'en aurais besoin pour manipuler la Tour de Cristal. Peut-être pourrai-je ainsi mettre en branle le processus inverse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003600_BEQLUGG<tab>Thank you. I shall commence my work at once in concert with Unukalhai, and rigorously explore the possibility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003600_BEQLUGG<tab>Merci beaucoup. Je vais mener mes propres recherches en parallèle des travaux d'Unukalhai.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003610_BEQLUGG<tab>Thank you. While I make no promises at this stage, I shall rigorously explore the possibility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003610_BEQLUGG<tab>Merci beaucoup. Cela risque de prendre du temps, mais je vais mener mes propres recherches sur le sujet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003620_RYNE<tab>I too need to explore new possibilities for my powers. My recent experience at Nabaath Areng has taught me that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003620_RYNE<tab>De mon côté, je vais continuer à explorer les possibilités offertes par le pouvoir de la Lumière dont j'ai hérité. Nos péripéties à Nabaath Areng m'ont donné des idées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003630_RYNE<tab>To that end, I will set aside botany for a time, and focus instead on myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003630_RYNE<tab>Je n'abandonne pas la botanique pour autant, mais je pense que je dois aussi apprendre à mieux me connaître.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003640_RYNE<tab>Knowing Zero is out there, doing her utmost to restore her own world... It inspires me to redouble my efforts!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003640_RYNE<tab>Tous comptent sur moi, y compris Zero, mon amie d'un autre monde<var 1D /var>! Je ne dois pas baisser les bras<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003650_GAIA<tab>There you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003650_GAIA<tab>(-???-)Hé, Ryne<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003660_GAIA<tab>I waited and waited, but you never came. What have you been doing here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003660_GAIA<tab>(-???-)T'as un sacré culot de me poser un lapin<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que tu fiches encore ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003670_RYNE<tab>Gaia!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003670_RYNE<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! Gaïa<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003680_GAIA<tab>Oh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003680_GAIA<tab>Tiens<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003690_GAIA<tab>Do I know you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003690_GAIA<tab>... T'es qui, toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Don't tell me you've lost your memory again!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oh non<var 1D /var>! Gaïa a encore perdu la mémoire<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We promised to go for coffee biscuits, remember?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Celle)) ((Celui)) /var> avec qui tu dois aller manger des biscuits au café.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003700_GAIA<tab>Oh, I'm just teasing. I wouldn't forget you in a hurry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003700_GAIA<tab>Je blaguais, voyons. Tu crois vraiment que je pourrais oublier quelqu'un comme toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003710_GAIA<tab>I'm still keeping my diary, adding new memories to it every day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003710_GAIA<tab>Je tiens un journal. Et tous les jours, je me crée de nouveaux souvenirs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003720_RYNE<tab>Not only that, Gaia's writing a story too. I can't wait for it to become a book!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003720_RYNE<tab>En plus, elle écrit un roman en ce moment<var 1D /var>! J'ai hâte qu'il soit publié<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003725_GAIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003725_GAIA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003730_GAIA<tab>I never agreed to anything of the sort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003730_GAIA<tab>Je t'ai rien promis du tout... Si tu décides de mon emploi du temps à ma place, on va pas s'entendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003740_GAIA<tab>Besides, coffee biscuits are old news. I'd rather try something else.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003740_GAIA<tab>Et puis les biscuits au café... C'est tellement passé de mode, <var 08 E905 ((ma)) ((mon)) /var> pauvre... Il en faudra plus que ça pour attirer mon attention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003750_RYNE<tab>What? I thought you liked them too... Well, no matter. The Second Serving has something for every taste, so let's just go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003750_RYNE<tab>M-mais moi, j'aime toujours les biscuits au café du Rab<var 1D /var>!! Gaïa, tu viendras avec nous la prochaine fois<var 1D /var>? Gaïa, allez, dis oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003760_GAIA<tab>Enough about that. What were you talking about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003760_GAIA<tab>Bon, et je peux savoir ce que vous maniganciez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003770_GAIA<tab>Harnessing Darkness from the void... Now there's an idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003770_GAIA<tab>Hum... Une livraison de Ténèbres venant du néant... Cet échange de bons procédés tombe à point nommé, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003780_GAIA<tab>Of course, if you're dealing with Darkness, Ryne alone won't cut it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003780_GAIA<tab>Mais Ryne est bien trop maladroite pour manipuler le pouvoir des Ténèbres toute seule.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003790_GAIA<tab>Next time, call on me as well. All right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003790_GAIA<tab>T'as intérêt à m'appeler la prochaine fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003800_NAHBDEEN<tab>It cannot be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003800_NAHBDEEN<tab>(sanglote)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003810_NAHBDEEN<tab>Oh, Varshahn, my darling little brother... To think that I will never see you again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003810_NAHBDEEN<tab>Le satrape a perdu son œiiiil... Hic<var 1D /var>! Je ne reverrai plus Varshahn... Mon petit frère chéri...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003820_NIDHANA<tab>The way you carry on, anyone would think he was actually your brother...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003820_NIDHANA<tab>Euh... Tu sais, ce n'est pas vraiment ton petit frère...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003830_NIDHANA<tab>Save your tears, now. His Excellency still has one of his eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003830_NIDHANA<tab>Mais je te rappelle qu'il reste encore un œil à Vrtra.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003840_NIDHANA<tab>And he has made it clear he intends to continue using his vessel. You'll see Varshahn again, never fear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003840_NIDHANA<tab>Il a dit lui-même qu'il comptait bien l'utiliser pour manipuler à nouveau son mannequin... Tu vas le revoir, ton frangin adoré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003850_NAHBDEEN<tab>Truly? But...will it be the little one?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003850_NAHBDEEN<tab>C-c'est vrai<var 1D /var>!? Le tout pitit Varshahn<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003860_NIDHANA<tab>Personally, I prefer the adult vessel. It cuts a gallant figure, and has superior functionality besides.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003860_NIDHANA<tab>Euh... Tu sais, moi je préfère la version adulte. Il paraît qu'elle est plus pratique...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003870_NAHBDEEN<tab>Bah, I don't care about such things!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003870_NAHBDEEN<tab>Aaaaah<var 1D /var>!! C'est pas important, tout ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003880_NAHBDEEN<tab>My little brother is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003880_NAHBDEEN<tab>Moi je veux mon petit frère...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003885_NAHBDEEN<tab>Little! And adorable!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003885_NAHBDEEN<tab>Varshahn... Tout pitit, tout mignon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003890_NIDHANA<tab>Sisters give me strength...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003890_NIDHANA<tab>Puisque je te dis qu'il n'est pas ton frère...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis a fine thing being so loved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Quelle popularité... J'en serais presque jalouse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003910_ESTINIEN<tab>Had enough of the revelry, have you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003910_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est pas désagréable de se laisser aller de temps en temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003920_ESTINIEN<tab>So, what's next for our hero?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003920_ESTINIEN<tab>Des plans pour la suite, camarade<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003930_ESTINIEN<tab>No need to decide just yet. You'll recall our escapades in the void began with a treasure map I paid entirely too much gil for.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003930_ESTINIEN<tab>Ne t'en fais pas, je ne m'attendais pas à une réponse toute prête. Après tout, notre dernier périple a démarré par hasard, quand j'ai acheté cette carte au trésor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003940_ESTINIEN<tab>You can't force an adventure. It'll happen when it happens, and you'll know when the time is right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003940_ESTINIEN<tab>Il faut savoir laisser l'aventure venir à soi, tu sais<var 1D /var>? D'ailleurs, j'ai le sentiment qu'elle reviendra frapper à ta porte très bientôt...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003950_ESTINIEN<tab>Till then, it's good to lend an ear to others and their tales. And speaking of others...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003950_ESTINIEN<tab>D'ici là, pourquoi ne pas se mêler aux périples des autres<var 1D /var>? Ah, quand on parle de la Miqo'te...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003960_YSHTOLA<tab>Discussing each other's plans, are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003960_YSHTOLA<tab>Tiens donc... On s'intéresse à mes projets, par ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003970_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, I have nothing exciting to share. I foresee an extended confinement in my Sharlayan chambers, compiling my theories on cross-rift travel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003970_YSHTOLA<tab>Navrée de vous décevoir, mais maintenant que mes obligations sociales sont remplies, je vais m'isoler à Sharlayan afin de compiler mes notes sur les voyages interdimensionnels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>My research may be classified, prohibited by the powers that be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, j'ai bien peur qu'elles finissent dans les rayonnages interdits après décision du Conseil...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003990_YSHTOLA<tab>But so long as a bond exists between people, ever shall our worlds be connected. As it stands, a means to travel to the First is within reach, and I would be satisfied even should my research not exist in an official capacity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003990_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais peu m'importe. Ces liens qui nous unissent, ils relient aussi nos mondes. Tout ce que je veux, c'est pouvoir retourner un jour dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004000_YSHTOLA<tab>And what of you, Estinien? Have you any plans?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004000_YSHTOLA<tab>Et toi, Estinien, que comptes-tu faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004010_YSHTOLA<tab>[CHUCKLE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004010_YSHTOLA<tab>(rire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004020_YSHTOLA<tab>He never was one to stay put for long. Though I've no doubt he will make himself known when needed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004020_YSHTOLA<tab>Il n'a jamais été du genre à tenir en place... Mais je suis certaine que nous le reverrons très bientôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004030_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Old Sharlayan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004030_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, à Sharlayan

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004040_KRILE<tab>Everything appears to be in order...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004040_KRILE<tab>... Oui, cet ouvrage aussi confirme mes théories.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004050_KRILE<tab>Ahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004050_KRILE<tab>Aaah...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004055_KRILE<tab>Finished at last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004055_KRILE<tab>Enfin terminé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004060_KRILE<tab>So time-consuming... How nice would it be to have a mammet to handle such tasks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004060_KRILE<tab>Ça a pris plus de temps que je l'imaginais... Si seulement j'avais eu un automate de rangement pour m'aider...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004070_KRILE<tab>Now then, let's have a look at you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004070_KRILE<tab>Je peux enfin examiner cette lettre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004080_KRILE<tab>Quite old, this letter. We'll need to store it carefully.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004080_KRILE<tab>Elle semble si ancienne... Selon ce qu'elle contient, je vais peut-être devoir mieux la préserver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004085_KRILE<tab>[GASP] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004085_KRILE<tab>(surprise)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004090_KRILE<tab>Addressed to Grandfather! And come all the way from Tuliyollal, from a Guloo...someone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004090_KRILE<tab>Elle est adressée à mon grand-père<var 1D /var>! En provenance du royaume fédéré du Tuliyollal, qui plus est<var 1D /var>! Et l'expéditeur est un certain... Gulool quelque chose...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004100_KRILE<tab>The ink's too faded. Hardly anything is legible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004100_KRILE<tab>Oh, zut<var 1D /var>! L'encre a presque disparu, je n'arrive plus à lire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004110_KRILE<tab>Come on, give me something...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004110_KRILE<tab>Hmm... Je vais devoir décrypter tout ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004120_KRILE<tab>A commission to investigate the golden city...in Tural!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004120_KRILE<tab>Une requête d'expédition... à la recherche d'une mystérieuse “cité d'or” sur le continent de Tural<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004130_KRILE<tab>How odd... No one ever mentioned such a commission, nor have I seen any records.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004130_KRILE<tab>C'est étrange... Les archives des Élèves de Baldesion n'en ont jamais fait mention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004140_KRILE<tab>Hm? Something else in here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004140_KRILE<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>? Il y a autre chose dans l'enveloppe...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004150_KRILE<tab>What an unusual earring. How does it relate to the petition, I wonder...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004150_KRILE<tab>Quelle orfèvrerie atypique... Cette boucle d'oreille aurait-elle un rapport avec le contenu de la lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004160_KRILE<tab>Did you go there, Grandfather? To the golden city, in Tural?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004160_KRILE<tab>La cité d'or du continent de Tural... Est-ce là où mènent les pas de grand-père...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004170_ERENVILLE<tab>[SIGH] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004170_ERENVILLE<tab>(soupire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004180_ERENVILLE<tab>Back again already, after making a show of leaving...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004180_ERENVILLE<tab>Si j'avais su que j'allais revenir aussi vite, je n'aurais pas dérangé Krile...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004190_ERENVILLE<tab>Well, this is it. Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004190_ERENVILLE<tab>Bienvenue à Sharlayan, la Cité du savoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004200_ERENVILLE<tab>Quite a far cry from Tuliyollal, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004200_ERENVILLE<tab>Ça doit te changer de Tuliyollal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004210_ERENVILLE<tab>Come, let's go and find your candidate─our adventurer friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004210_ERENVILLE<tab>Sans plus attendre, allons chercher <var 08 E905 ((cette aventurière)) ((cet aventurier)) /var> dont je t'ai parlé.
